subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Spain advanced to the Davis Cup semifinals by establishing a 3-0 lead against Germany. Feliciano López and Fernando Verdasco beat Philipp Kohlschreiber and Philipp Petzschner, 6-7, (3), 7-6 (1), 6-4, 2-6, 12-10, in Bremen, Germany.
snippet: Spain advanced to the Davis Cup semifinals by establishing a 3-0 lead against Germany. Feliciano López and Fernando Verdasco beat Philipp Kohlschreiber and Philipp Petzschner, 6-7, (3), 7-6 (1), 6-4, 2-6, 12-10, in Bremen, Germany.
